title: [BUG] pipeline example doesn't run

labels.name: area/recipes
labels.description: MLflow Recipes, Recipes APIs, Recipes configs, Recipe Templates

body:
### Issues Policy acknowledgement

- [X] I have read and agree to submit bug reports in accordance with the [issues policy](https://www.github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/master/ISSUE_POLICY.md)

### Willingness to contribute

No. I cannot contribute a bug fix at this time.

### MLflow version

1.30

### System information

- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: ubuntu 20.04
- **Python version**: 3.9.14
- **yarn version, if running the dev UI**: n/a


### Describe the problem

Pipeline example errors with:

mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: Exactly one of `experiment_name` or `experiment_id` must be specified


### Tracking information

MLflow version: 1.30.0
Tracking URI: file:///home/kaina/work/repo/mlp-regression-template/mlruns
Artifact URI: file:///home/kaina/work/repo/mlp-regression-template/mlruns/0/eded7004b3534c279f508d41177d8dd7/artifacts


### Code to reproduce issue

straight from the website:

git clone https://github.com/mlflow/mlp-regression-template
cd mlp-regression-template
mlflow pipelines run --profile local

### Stack trace

```
2022/10/26 10:25:42 INFO mlflow.pipelines.pipeline: Creating MLflow Pipeline 'mlp-regression-template' with profile: 'local'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/core/bin/mlflow", line 8, in <module>
    sys.exit(cli())
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1130, in __call__
    return self.main(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1055, in main
    rv = self.invoke(ctx)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1657, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1657, in invoke
    return _process_result(sub_ctx.command.invoke(sub_ctx))
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/click/core.py", line 1404, in invoke
    return ctx.invoke(self.callback, **ctx.params)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/click/core.py", line 760, in invoke
    return __callback(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/cli.py", line 46, in run
    Pipeline(profile=profile).run(step)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/pipeline.py", line 452, in __new__
    return pipeline_class_module(pipeline_root_path, profile)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/pipeline.py", line 54, in __init__
    self._steps = self._resolve_pipeline_steps()
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/pipeline.py", line 323, in _resolve_pipeline_steps
    return [
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/pipeline.py", line 324, in <listcomp>
    s.from_pipeline_config(pipeline_config, self._pipeline_root_path)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/steps/transform.py", line 203, in from_pipeline_config
    return cls(step_config, pipeline_root)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/steps/transform.py", line 52, in __init__
    self.tracking_config = TrackingConfig.from_dict(self.step_config)
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/utils/tracking.py", line 110, in from_dict
    return TrackingConfig(
  File "/home/kaina/.pyenv/versions/3.9.14/envs/core/lib/python3.9/site-packages/mlflow/pipelines/utils/tracking.py", line 72, in __init__
    raise MlflowException(
mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: Exactly one of `experiment_name` or `experiment_id` must be specified
```

### Other info / logs

_No response_

### What component(s) does this bug affect?

- [ ] `area/uiux`: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server
- [ ] `area/docker`: Docker use across MLflow's components, such as MLflow Projects and MLflow Models

- [ ] `language/r`: R APIs and clients
